attributes.action: Petition Committee reform the website to the standard of GOV Civil online claims
attributes.additional_details: We Humbly SHOWETH evidence of 1837 sessions & the Parliamentary papers act 1840 prescribes it. The Copyright act 1911 section 20 & Control of advertisements 2007 schedule 1 class F, 1688 Bill of Rights, Right to Petition provisions. Our petitioning here is undermined of support & this is a grievance we have with this committee to update its policy. Parliamentary Privileges Act 1604. 2020 Criminal procedure rules Legally privileged items & information, Public Meeting Act 1908 are all study law
attributes.background: We PRAY that the Committee and Speaker of the House do move to introduce Warrants and Summons forms and certificates for petitioners to use, affirm right to privileges & a more engaged casework worthy of this honourable House & Jurisdiction in extremely serious causes fit for modern democratic world
